thread.title: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet
thread.title_full: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet

title: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet
text:
Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet Written by: Mia Taylor 08/20/15 - 1:15 PM EDT Tickers in this article: CCL 
NEW YORK ( MainStreet ) â€” Cruise ship vacations are known for many things -- with bountiful buffets and overeating, over-the-top Broadway-style entertainment, discos and casinos as just some of their typical hallmarks. 
They are not however, well-known for highlighting social causes, providing daily volunteer opportunities for travelers or emphasizing selfless giving as the primary vacation activity. Carnival Corporation is poised to change all that with the launch of its new brand, Fathom, a cruise that does not involve any of the industry's usual attractions. More Headlines
